deny.title: Access Denied
deny.owner: Only the bot owner can access this command.
deny.admin: Only an administrator can access this command.
deny.default: You don't have permission to use this command.

errors.loadingError: I'm not done loading yet. Try again in a few seconds.
errors.interactionFailure: Something went wrong while processing your request.
errors.commandFailure: Something went wrong while running this command.
errors.commandError: No code found for this command.
errors.buttonFailure: Something went wrong while running this button.
errors.buttonBusy: This button is already running, wait a moment.
errors.buttonError: No code found for this button.
errors.menuFailure: Something went wrong while running this menu.
errors.menuError: No code found for this select menu.
errors.commandListDMs: Can't access all these commands here? Try using them inside of a server.

about: I'm a bot, I do things sometimes.
Check out what I can do in [__`/bot commands`__].
